sentences.english: What the alarm clock wakes up is only my body, not my sleeping heart.

sentences.english: She's just a shell of who she once was.'
In the central Benghazi, there is the burnt-out shell of the sinister internal security headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 在班加西中部，安全总部仅剩下疲惫不堪躯壳。

sentences.english: Life truly wears them down and out and there is nothing but a shell of a person left.
sentences.chinese: 生活令他们精疲力竭，徒剩一副躯壳。

sentences.english: It was still him in there, inside the failing shell.

definition: main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
